What do you get if you cross Polar Post with Yoto? The ultimate Christmas bundle! ‚ú®

@polar.post and @yotoplay have partnered up to offer one family a fantastically festive package containing a variety of delightful goodies.

At the very heart of the North Pole there is a Post Office ‚Äì The POLAR POST OFFICE. All letters from children to Santa Claus pour into this Post Office with each one of these letters answered by Father Christmas himself, written on his official notepaper bearing the Christmas coat of arms.

 

Winners will receive The Tale of Toys by Father Christmas, a Dasher and Dancer milk chocolate bar, a handwritten letter from Father Christmas himself, a Yoto Player, and a selection of Christmas Yoto Cards.

To enter:
1) Like and save this post
2) Follow @yotoplay
3) Follow @polar.post
4) Tag as many people as you like in the comments below ‚Äì each new tag counts as another entry!

Giveaway ends on Friday, November 17th at 11:59 pm GMT. Winner announced the following Monday. Must be 18+ and a resident of the U.K. to enter. Prizes are non-transferable. Giveaway not affiliated with Instagram. We do not create separate giveaway accounts. If you receive any messages from other accounts regarding our competition, do not give any personal information and please report them to Instagram immediately.

Yoto Mini is here!

Meet our new portable player. Yoto Mini lets kids of all ages explore an inspiring world of audio - anytime, anywhere.

Thanks to its small size and long battery life, Yoto Mini is perfect for school runs, flights, and family outings - packing the best of Yoto into an on-the-go audio companion.

Get personal with headphones or start a party with size-defying sound. Learn more about its features by tapping the 'Mini' Highlight on our page.

Available from the 24th of November. Learn more at yotoplay.com.
